apikey.description: Pass your OAuth User ID to make an unauthenticated request for delayed data.

endDate.description: End date as milliseconds since epoch. If startDate and endDate are provided, period should not be provided. Default is previous trading day.

frequency.description:
The number of the frequencyType to be included in each candle.

Valid frequencies by frequencyType (defaults marked with an asterisk):

minute: 1*, 5, 10, 15, 30
daily: 1*
weekly: 1*
monthly: 1*

frequencyType.description:
The type of frequency with which a new candle is formed.

Valid frequencyTypes by periodType (defaults marked with an asterisk):

day: minute*
month: daily, weekly*
year: daily, weekly, monthly*
ytd: daily, weekly*

needExtendedHoursData.description: true to return extended hours data, false for regular market hours only. Default is true

period.description:
The number of periods to show.

Example: For a 2 day / 1 min chart, the values would be:

period: 2
periodType: day
frequency: 1
frequencyType: min

Valid periods by periodType (defaults marked with an asterisk):

day: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 10*
month: 1*, 2, 3, 6
year: 1*, 2, 3, 5, 10, 15, 20
ytd: 1*

periodType.description: The type of period to show. Valid values are day, month, year, or ytd (year to date). Default is day.

startDate.description: Start date as milliseconds since epoch. If startDate and endDate are provided, period should not be provided.
